segments.text: Well , Mitzuko-san , I hope you like it here . This is my favourite restaurant in Taipei . It reminds me of my youth when I traveled around Europe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The chef trained in Florence . The pasta is very good here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . So , what can you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hum ... You should try the mushroom fettucine . It's really good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . It has a very delicate flavor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What does ' Duppa del Giono ' mean ? I'm sorry I don't know how to pronounce that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that means soup of the day . I'll ask the waiter what they have today . Have you tried mussels cooked the Italian way ? They're really delicious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I'll try them . Sounds good .
segments.speaker: S2
